name: Content Calendar Notion Template
description: Manage all of your content in one place with your own customizable Notion Content Calendar. Includes prompts for YouTube, email, articles, and threads. I've included a number of views to help you manage your content workflow including:Plan ahead (for creating content)Weekly scheduler (to review week)Content calendar (to get a clear overview of all content going out)The database itself includes templates with prompts for YouTube, email, articles, and threads. Note: This is a free template that is
features: Plan ahead (for creating content); Weekly scheduler (to review week); Content calendar (to get a clear overview of all content going out)
